lines.text: [Jamey talking to an old woman, who's husband is dead. The old woman, however, does not think her husband is dead]
Does this person speak any other languages than English at home?
No, and you do not have to whisper. His hearing aid is off.
Very well, well, not well or not at all?
Have this person taken a job the last week?
No, already have a job? No, temporary ill? Or no for other reasons?
